page.title: 01Rhiw Saeson
page.content: This is an area of plateau deeply disected by the Nant Cwfan and Clegyr Valleys. The Nant Cwfan Valley is followed by a poorly maintained & narrow unclasified road linking the A458(T) to the north with the A to the south. Cwm Clegyr is a dead end valley. Most of the houses in Clegyrnant such as Rhyd-y-Meisoch have been abandoned. Blain-y-Cwm at the head of the valley is run by a manager. The lower valley sides are in improved pasture whilst the higher land is in rough pasture and moorland.
